sentences.en: "Tired and emotional" is a code word for being drunk.
sentences.cn: “又累又激动”是形容人喝醉酒的一种委婉说法。

sentences.en: David would get drunk and I would have to take him home and put him to bed.
sentences.cn: 戴维常会喝醉，我就得把他弄回家放到床上。

sentences.en: Getting drunk is a thing all young men do.
sentences.cn: 喝醉酒这种情况小伙子都会有。

sentences.en: He asked for ice for his whiskey and proceeded to get drunk.
sentences.cn: 他要求给他的威士忌里面加冰，接着喝得大醉。

sentences.en: He had drunk half a bottle of whisky.
sentences.cn: 他已经喝掉了半瓶威士忌。

sentences.en: He must be either mad or drunk.
sentences.cn: 他要么是疯了，要么是喝醉了。

sentences.en: He was punch-drunk with fatigue and depressed by the rain.
sentences.cn: 他疲惫不堪，头昏沉沉的，因为下雨情绪也很低落。

sentences.en: He was so drunk that he had lost the power of speech.
sentences.cn: 他醉得太厉害，连话都说不出来了。

sentences.en: I felt drunk with the excitement of life.
sentences.cn: 当时我沉醉于生活中的精彩刺激。

sentences.en: I got drunk and had to be carried home.
sentences.cn: 我喝醉了，只好让人把我送回家。

sentences.en: I had a terrible head and was extraordinarily drunk.
sentences.cn: 我头很痛，已经酩酊大醉。

sentences.en: Last night I got drunk and rolfed my dinner.
sentences.cn: 昨天晚上我喝醉了，把晚饭全吐出来了。

sentences.en: Some people moved in silky, liquid movements, others were jerky, probably drunk.
sentences.cn: 一些人动作平稳流畅，其他人则跌跌撞撞，大概是喝醉了。

sentences.en: The landlord refused to serve him because he considered him too drunk.
sentences.cn: 酒吧老板觉得他已经喝多了，拒绝再给他添酒。

sentences.en: They are currently drunk with success.
sentences.cn: 他们现在正陶醉于成功之中。

sentences.en: They got drunk and puked out the window.

trans.tran_en: unable to control your behaviour, speech etc because you have drunk too much alcohol
